column5: What a great first year Walleye derby for the Caledonia Hunters & Anglers Association. They had 38 entrants that fished the derby. Weather was great, river was perfect. Anyone that has never tried fishing the river should give it a try. I had 2 newbies with me that had never fished the river before, now they have a different thought about the river, wanting to do it again. Special thanks to all that helped out. OH and the burgers and dogs were great. First place went to Dave Steeves with a 2.11 Lb. Walleye. Second Place went to Craig Marsh with a 2.07 Lb. Walleye. Third Place went to Dan Farrar with a 1.11 Lb. Walleye. Dave left accepting his prize from derby organizer Glenn Moncrieffe  Left to right, Dave, Craig, Dan.  This was Dave's fishing partners AL & Harvey left&right  Nothing like blowing your own horn, but winning doesn't come that often.
Good stuff Dave. Thanks for sharing!
That's awesome Dave    Congrats on the win   I'm assuming here you kept the walleye    Ummmmm fish fry    I foresee a hot pan in your future with patatoes and sauteed vegetables Congrats again

Thanks Roy. Being Glenn's first year running a derby he did alright, but he's going to make a few changes. One thing he made some money for the kids derby next year  Thanks Jacque, that river is just a catch and release fishery for me. The water there Jacque is not like water in your area, the river water is pretty dirty. But I know a few people that do eat the fish from the Grand River.
Fantastic Dave!! Congrats on the win!

I made that mistake this year. I got one right after opener above the dunnville dam. I figured what the heck and tried it. Man was it gross haha. It tasted nothing like a Lake Erie walleye or northern walleye.  I won't take another thats forsure haha.
Atta boy Dave, 1st place is always a good thing !!

Thanks guys, we split the cash 3 ways. Got home, wife and I and had Chinese. Can't wait for the next derby in a couple weeks. Caledonia bait and tackle is having a Walleye derby on the river Oct 12,13,14. I may have to buy someone else Chinese
Chinese  You could of made a whole boiled dinner and a slab of turkey breast.  Nice win Bud.
Now your talkin, now thats good vitals
